parameters.name: ContactGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the alert contact group.

parameters.name: GroupIds
parameters.description: The ID of the alert contact group.

parameters.name: IsDetail
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return all the alert contacts in the queried alert contact group. Valid values:

*   `false`
*   `true`

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: The number of alert contact groups displayed on each page.
